titles.title: I've Got a Love Song in My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got a love song in my heart,
(I've got a love song in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God)
I've got a love song in my heart,
(I've got a love song in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got a passion in my heart,
(I've got a passion in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God)
I've got a passion in my heart,
(I've got a passion in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
La la la la la la la, La la la la la la la
La la la la la la la x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've got rejoicing in my heart,
(I've got rejoicing in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God) x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And there is dancing in my heart, (And there is dancing in my heart)
It is for You, Lord, my God.
(It is for You, Lord, my God) x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I've never known a love like this,
(I've never known a love like this)
I've never known a love like this.
(I've never known a love like this) x2
